game.name: Military Defense Strike
game.description:
The graphically-improved and thrilling-packed action games are the first choices of many boys. If you are also amongst the ones for whom becoming an action hero has been the biggest dream of life, the Military Defense Strike game is the best thing to try. In this brand new action game, your job is to aim and fire, and clean the area from all the dangerous enemies. The gameplay will take you to an environment where you have to protect the home base through your intense fighting abilities.

When you click the play button, you enter the game and find yourself standing in front of a castle you have to protect against the enemies. Grab your machine gun and be prepared to destroy all the bad souls who want to capture your home base! Try to attack at the right time to create the maximum damage for your enemies while defending your position wisely in this html5 shooter game! Enemies will keep coming to your base to challenge your skills.

The power of enemies would keep increasing with each level. So, be careful and try to believe in your fighting skills to make your win this tower defense game. Use your right and left sides of the screen to clear the area from the bad guys in this cool military game! Make sure to click at the right time to see the path of the victory as fast as you can. We are delighted to offer the best quality action-packed challenges that are playable on all modern browsers, no download required.
